 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשׁ‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==horse, steed== (less common synonym of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span> ( &gt; explained away by [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW viii (1888). 191</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***horse, mare*** (often), so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרס‎</span> ***horse***, [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Him. Inschr. 70</sup>); — Plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשִׁים‎</span> (erroneous for \* <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרָשִׁים‎</span> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 89</sup>) [[Ezek.27.14|Ezek 27:14]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשָׁיו‎</span> [[Isa.28.28|Isa 28:28]]; [[1Sam.8.11|1Sam 8:11]] — ***steeds*** [[Ezek.27.14|Ezek 27:14]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרָדִים‎</span>), from Togarmah; simile of swiftness [[Joel.2.4|Joel 2:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span>); probably also [[Isa.28.28|Isa 28:28]]; [[Jer.46.4|Jer 46:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]), and perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׂם לוֺ בְּמֶרְכַבְחוֺ וּבָעָרָשָׁיו וְרָצוּ וגו‎</span> [[1Sam.8.11|1Sam 8:11]] (king subject). 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשׁ‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]]</sup> ==horseman== (i.e. \* <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parrâš***</u></abbr>, compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:84b»§ 84 b.b</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פָּרָשׁ‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]]; [[Jer.4.29|Jer 4:29]], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.26.10|Ezek 26:10]] (as if construct [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Synt. § 337 s</sup>); Plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשָׁים‎</span> [[Gen.50.9|Gen 50:9]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשָׁיו‎</span> [[Exod.14.9|Exod 14:9]] +; — ***horseman***, usually plural, especially + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span> ***charioty:*** Egyptain [[Gen.50.9|Gen 50:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.24.6|Josh 24:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.14.9|Exod 14:9]]; [[Exod.14.17|Exod 14:17]]; [[Exod.14.18|Exod 14:18]]; [[Exod.17.23|Exod 17:23]]; [[Exod.14.26|Exod 14:26]]; [[Exod.14.28|Exod 14:28]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Exod.15.19|Exod 15:19]] (song), [[Isa.31.1|Isa 31:1]]; [[2Kgs.18.34|2Kgs 18:34]] = [[Isa.36.9|Isa 36:9]]; [[2Chr.12.3|2Chr 12:3]] compare [[2Chr.16.8|2Chr 16:8]] Philistine [[1Sam.13.5|1Sam 13:5]]; [[2Sam.1.6|2Sam 1:6]] (strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲלֵי‎</span> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); Aramaean [[2Sam.10.18|2Sam 10:18]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ‎</span>, compare \|\| [[1Chr.19.18|1Chr 19:18]], [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others), and (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ רַגְלִי‎</span>) [[2Sam.8.4|2Sam 8:4]] = [[1Chr.18.4|1Chr 18:4]], compare [[1Chr.19.6|1Chr 19:6]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלסֿוּס וּפָרָשִׁים‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.20|1Kgs 20:20]] (si vera lectio) Israel, of Adonijah [[1Kgs.1.5|1Kgs 1:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמִשִּׁים אִישׁ רָצִים‎</span>; Solomon + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span> [[1Kgs.9.19|1Kgs 9:19]]; [[1Kgs.9.22|1Kgs 9:22]]; [[1Kgs.10.26|1Kgs 10:26]] = [[2Chr.8.6|2Chr 8:6]]; [[2Chr.8.9|2Chr 8:9]]; [[2Chr.1.14|2Chr 1:14]] (twice in verse), Prob also [[1Kgs.5.6|1Kgs 5:6]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים לְמֶרְכָּבוֺ‎</span>) = [[2Chr.9.25|2Chr 9:25]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמֶרְכָּכוֺת‎</span>); Jehoahaz [[2Kgs.13.7|2Kgs 13:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלִי‎</span>); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span>, figurative of Elijah [[2Kgs.2.12|2Kgs 2:12]], of Elisha [[2Kgs.13.14|2Kgs 13:14]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span> [[Hos.1.7|Hos 1:7]] Assyrian [[Isa.22.6|Isa 22:6]]; [[Isa.22.7|Isa 22:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span>), compare [[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִכְבֵי סוּסִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ezek.23.6|Ezek 23:6]]; [[Ezek.23.12|Ezek 23:12]] Babylonian [[Hab.1.8|Hab 1:8]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.4.29|Jer 4:29]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹמֵה קֶשֶׁת‎</span>), [[Ezek.26.7|Ezek 26:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span>), v[[Ezek.26.10|Ezek 26:10]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּלְגַּל וָרֶכֶב‎</span>), Scythian (Gog) [[Ezek.38.4|Ezek 38:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים‎</span>); Persian [[Isa.21.7|Isa 21:7]]; [[Isa.21.9|Isa 21:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶמֶד פ‎</span>), [[Neh.2.9|Neh 2:9]]; [[Ezra.8.22|Ezra 8:22]] of kings of north [[Dan.11.40|Dan 11:40]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span>).
